p:
The seven introduction scenarios were defined by the following number of introduction patches (and the initial prevalence p
i in these patches): 1 (25%), 5 (10%), 10 (5%), 15 (2%), 20 (1%), 25 (1%) or 30 (1%). For a given introduction scenario, all simulations were performed with the same introduction patches, which were chosen at random with the constraint that the first introduction occurred at year 1 and all other introductions occurred before year 6 ( S1 Fig).
